page.title: 09JULIE-MY MONDAY
page.content: RISE 08.15 NO BREAKFAST AND LEAVE FOR SCHOOL.MORNING CLASSES ARE ENGLISH, GEOGRAPHY AND FRENCH.AT BREAK I WENT TO THE P.E. DEPARTMENT FOR AN EARLY LUNCH PASS FOR INDOOR HOCKEY.AFTER BREAK MATHS AND FRENCH. DINNER-HAMBURGER ROLL AND A DRINK OF ORANGE.WENT TO INDOOR HOCKEY WHERE WE WON 1 GAME AND LOST ANOTHER AS DID THE OTHER 2 TEAMS SO WE HAD TO TAKE PENALTIES TO SEE WHICH TEAM WON. ANOTHER TEAM WON SO THEY GOT A MARS BAR EACH. I GAVE UP 3 PERIODS HISTORY,RE AND ENGLISH TO COME AND DO THE DOMESDAY PROJECT WHERE WE WORK HARD. AFTER SCHOOL I WENT UP TO THE SPORTS INSTITUTE WITH MRS SMITH, PHILIPA,LESLEY AND JENNIFER.SOME BOYS WENT AS WELL.WE PRACTISED THE RELAY. HOME AT 17.00,TEA,HOMEWORK,TV AND BED.
